verses.1: Tu-in David teekin kum tampi pha a, amah in Israel tungah kumpi-in a tapa Solomon a koih hi.
verses.2: David in Israel makai khempeuh le siampite le Levi mite a khawm hi.
verses.3: Levi mite kum sawm thum panin a tungsiah teeng kisim a, a vekpi-in pasal tul sawm thum le tul giat pha hi.
verses.4: David in, “Hihte sung panin tul sawm nih le tul li in Topaʼ biakinn sungah nasep uk dinga, tul guk pen mangte le thukhente hi dinga,
verses.5: tul li kongcingte le tul li in phat nadinga ka bawl sa lasaknate tawh Topa tungah phatna pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin David in Levi mite a behbehin pawl thum suah a, tuate pen: Gershom pawl, Kohath pawl le Merari pawl ahi uh hi.
verses.7: Gershomʼ tapate: Ladan le Shimei ahi uh hi.
verses.8: Ladanʼ tapate: A ukpi Jehiel le Zetham le Joel, thum pha uh hi.
verses.9: Shimeiʼ tapate: Shelomoth, Haziel le Haran, thum pha uh hi. Hihte pen Ladanʼ beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin Shimeiʼ tapate: Jahath, Zina, Jeush le Beriah ahi uh hi. Hih lite pen Shimeiʼ tapate ahi uh hi.
verses.11: Jahath a ukpi hi-in, Zina a nihna ahi hi. Ahih hangin Jeush le Beriah-te in tapa tampi nei lo uh ahih manin innkuan khat kisuak sakin sim khatin kisim khawm uh hi.
verses.12: Kohathʼ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel, li pha uh hi.
verses.13: Amramʼ tapate: Aaron le Moses ahi uh hi. Amah le a tapate in Topaʼ mai ah paknamtui a hal tawntung ding le ama na semin ama min tawh thupha a piak tawntung theih nadingin a siangtho pen nate a ap dingin Aaron kituam koih hi.
verses.14: Ahih hangin Pasianʼ mipa Mosesʼ tapate ahihleh Levi minamte lakah kisim hi.
verses.15: Mosesʼ tapate: Gershom le Eliezer ahi uh hi.
verses.16: Gershomʼ tapate lakah Shebuel a ukpi ahi hi.
verses.17: Eliezerʼ tapa Rehabiah zong a ukpi ahi hi. Eliezer in tapa dang nei lo a, ahih hangin Rehabiahʼ tapate tam mahmah hi.
verses.18: Kohathʼ tapa nihna Izharʼ tapate lakah Shelomoth a ukpi ahi hi.
verses.19: Kohathʼ tapa thumna Hebronʼ tapate lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna le Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
verses.20: Kohathʼ tapa lina Uzzielʼ tapate lakah: Mikah a ukpi le Isshiah a nihna ahi hi.
verses.21: Merariʼ tapate: Mahli le Mushi ahi hi. Mahliʼ tapate: Eleazar le Kish ahi hi.
verses.22: Eleazar in tapa nei loin si a, tanu bek nei hi. Amauʼ tanau, Kish tapate in amaute teenpih uh hi.
verses.23: Mushiʼ tapate: Mahli, Eder le Jeremoth, thum pha uh hi.
verses.24: Hihte pen Topaʼ biakinn nasepna ah na a sem ding, kum sawm nih panin a tungsiah, a milipin a minin a mi phazah zui-in a kiciaptehna bangin beh lutangte, a behbehin Levi suante ahi hi.
verses.25: Bang hang hiam cih leh David in, “Israel Pasian, Topa in a mite tungah lungnopna pia zo a, Jerusalem ah amah om tawntung ta hi.
verses.26: Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in puanbuk hitaleh tua tawh kisai nasep nading nate khat peuhpeuh hitaleh a puak ding uh kisam nawn lo hi,” a ci hi.
verses.27: Bang hang hiam cih leh Davidʼ thupiakna a nunung pen tawh a kisim hihte pen kum sawm nih panin a tungsiah Levi mi a phazah ahi hi.
verses.28: “Ahih hangin amauteʼ nasep ding pen Topaʼ biakinn nasepna ah Aaronʼ suante huhin, biakinn tualte le biakinn deite kemin, biakna na khempeuh a siangthosak ding le Pasianʼ biakinn nasepna ah hih ding khat peuhpeuh a sem ding uh ahi hi.
verses.29: Ompihna Anlum, an tawh biak nadingin annel, silngo sawh loh anlum moh, a ki-em piakna, sathau tawh a kihel piakna le a tam tehna ahih kei leh a lian tehna nasep khempeuh zong a huh ding uh ahi hi.
verses.30: Tua ciangin amaute zingsang simin ding ding uh a, lungdamna ko-in Topa phatin, nitakin zong tua bangmahin hih ding uh a,
verses.31: a mal zah a kisam bangin Sabbath nite, Khadet nite le pawi nite-in Topa tungah meihal biakna a kipiak peuhpeuh ciangin a tawntungin Topaʼ mai ah om ding uh hi.
verses.32: Tua bangin amaute in kikhopna puanbuk le biakinn kemin, Topaʼ biakinn nasepna ah amauʼ behte ahi Aaronʼ suante huh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
